title: Luxury Hotels in Bhubaneswar Depict Architectural Wonder
text:
Luxury Hotels in Bhubaneswar Depict Architectural Wonder Luxury Hotels in Bhubaneswar Depict Architectural Wonder 0 
Bhubaneswar, the capital of Orissa, is a city of financial and religious significance. It is the biggest city of Orissa and is famously known as the 'Sanctuary City of India'. This capital of Odisha (Orissa) is most famous for its temples and as a cultural, political, educational, and commercial hub of the state and Eastern part of India. The luxury hotels in Bhubaneswar nestled in the city's heart have been the first choice among business and leisure tourists who come here to explore the wonderful attractions. 
As far as ancient and prehistoric architectural wonders are concerned, the city is still witnessing 700 temples. The Lingaraj Mandir, dedicated to Lord Shiva, is one of the largest temples in the state of Odisha. Temples not only in Bhubaneswar, but in entire state are an architectural reverence, known as the sub-style of the Nagara style of the North Indian temples. The design of each temple is predominantly associated with Shiva, Surya, and Vishnu Temples. 
Additionally, varied collection of caves that are cut into the hillside on the outskirts of the city are also must see attractions during your Bhubaneswar tour. Do not forget to travel to Udayagiri or Sunrise Hills. Moreover, the Ekamravan garden of medicinal herbs and plants is also highly notable. 
The Nandankanan Sanctuary, known as a home to White Tigers, is a favorite spot with wildlife enthusiasts. During your tour to Bhubaneswar, you will have a lot more to discover. However, you need some more days to travel around the architectural wonders and temples. When it comes to staying in the capital of Odisha, you will find numerous hotels and resorts ranging from budget hotels to luxury hotels in Bhubaneswar. 
It provides you the feeling of royal lifestyle during your entire stay. Luxuriously detailed interiors that you will see in every corner are flawlessly harmonized by a choice of global and Indian cuisine. It offers an array of activities to relax and revitalize your senses for the next pleasurable trip. 
There are numerous deluxe hotels in Bhubaneswar near airport known to provide a comfy accommodation, even venues, premium services, and excellent facilities that will keep you enticed for a long time to come. Meanwhile, the luxury hotels in Bhubaneswar near airport make your accommodation in the Temple City of India memorable and full of wonders. Here, you will experience majesty and magnificence supremacy of Temples, wildlife, Chilka Lake, Puri and Konark at a few kilometers distance. 
The spa facilities are remarkable, especially Pevonia spa, known for providing amazing Thai and Ayurvedic massages, body treatments, aromatherapy and hydrotherapy. You have to book the room in advance to enjoy the services. Having travelled extensively across all of Odisha and staying in both, luxury as well as business hotels, the author has been credited to be somewhat of an expert on Hotels in Bhubaneshwar and Hotels in Bhubaneshwar Near Airport .
